summary: AFTER PULLING OUT OF A DRIVEWAY, VEHICLES IN FRONT OF ME CAME TO AN ABRUPT STOP.  I STEPPED HARD ON THE BRAKES AND 4WAL ABS BRAKES DID NOT WORK.  I WAS ONLY GOING ABOUT 15 OR 20 MPH.  THIS IS THE 2ND ACCIDENT IN 6 MONTHS BUT DODGE SAYS THERE IS NOTHING WRONG.  THIS DID MORE DAMAGE THAN THE 1ST ACCIDENT.  WHAT IS WRONG WITH THE BRAKING SYSTEM?
